name: Vision (Horned)
description:
Hi there welcome to BOTS INC i am so glad to see you here to purchase one of our SUPER BOTS. Now they are LIMITED EDITION do to unforseen circumstances.

Heres some stuff he can do!

he can do the dishes

he can zoom in on photos

he can protect you

he can reverse gravity

In this brief puzzle game you play as a robot who has a fatal error, do to this fact they send him to the smelter to be turned into scrap. solve five different puzzles by finding the yellow orb on each map to get to the next map

Controls:

a-d/right-left to move

up-down/w-d to look up/down

f to flip screen

esc to bring up pause menu

this took me two days to make
